sentences.english: The sapling that bears our mark of love has grown into a big tree
sentences.chinese: 刻下愛的見證的小樹，已長成大樹。

sentences.english: The young tree has struck root.
He had followed her into the shrubbery with no idea of trying it.
sentences.chinese: 他跟她走進小樹林時，並沒想到要試一試。

sentences.english: My wood makes me feel heavy.
sentences.chinese: 我的小樹林讓我覺得沉重。

sentences.english: There is a small woods a lot of .
sentences.chinese: 有一個小樹林，裏面有許多美麗的鳥兒。

sentences.english: It sounded like someone just snapped a twig right behind me.
sentences.chinese: 好象是有人在我背後折斷了一根小樹枝。

sentences.english: The young father did so and at once the young tree bent.
sentences.chinese: 年輕父親解開繩子，小樹馬上彎下了腰。

sentences.english: The bird began to put twigs and grass in the hat.
sentences.chinese: 小鳥開始往帽子裏放小樹枝和草。

sentences.english: Dressed in green in the trees leaned over the touch.
sentences.chinese: 俯身觸摸身穿綠衣的小樹。

sentences.english: We will have our picnic there in the small woods by the lake.
sentences.chinese: 我們將在湖邊的小樹林裏野餐。

sentences.english: The Longman Chinese Reader Series is written for Primary School students, focusing on the development of oral skills.
sentences.chinese: 《朗文小樹繪本叢書》爲幫助小學生學習口語而編寫。

sentences.english: Small branches are closing or having opening hours reduced.
sentences.chinese: 小樹枝被關閉或有開放時間減少。

sentences.english: Xiao gang full head big sweat from the river to play water to help young trees watered.
sentences.chinese: 小剛滿頭大汗的從小河邊打來水幫小樹澆水。

sentences.english: Cows graze in droves on grass that grows on grooves in groves.
sentences.chinese: 成羣的奶牛在小樹林裏喫溝邊的草。

sentences.english: Tell me, friend, how far is the grove.
sentences.chinese: 朋友，告訴我，離小樹林有多遠。

definition: Tashu township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
to sprout (leaves, buds, a beard etc)
style of folk song popular in Gansu, Qinghai and Ningxia/CL:首[shou3]
